name: MrStockNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This flash briefing tells your stock market related news. It is updated every hours, and tells you the market headlines, major index up and down, most gaining stocks, most losing stocks, and most active stocks. 
It is specially designed for ones who want to stay on top of the stock market. It is a must-have news provider that gives you accurate stock market news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
